snippet: Given the way things work in Albany, Proposal 1 is likely to benefit whichever party wins control of the State Senate after the next decennial census in 2020.
abstract: New York State ballot item to reform redistricting will likely benefit whichever party wins control of State Senate after next census in 2020.
lead_paragraph: Given the way things work in Albany, Proposal 1 is likely to benefit whichever party wins control of the State Senate after the next decennial census in 2020.

headline.main: Ballot Item Would Reform Redistricting, at Least in Theory
headline.print_headline: Ballot Item Would Reform Redistricting, at Least in Theory
